featured.text: From (A) to (H) in the above chatroom discussions, which ones show that GreenBurger can be a choice for the chatroom participants themselves only under certain circumstances?
After hours of discussion, our class finally reached the _____ that we would go to Hualien for our graduation trip.
For a temporary escape, she joined a small writers’ group, in which each member was required to bring a story or poem for discussion.
The discussion moved to Anthony’s recovery.

other.text: To have a full discussion of the issue, the committee spent a whole hour _____ their ideas at the meeting.
As they moved from one table to another, they noticed new ideas emerging from the discussions.
Over the course of the morning, the innovative discussion process 14 a new form of collective effort that transformed the depth, scope, and quality of their discussion.
After heated debates and discussions, the government was finally persuaded to consider another 19 effective method: giving the pigeons birth control.

definition.en_def: The action or process of talking about something to reach a decision or to exchange ideas.
definition.example: We had a discussion about the best way to improve our project.
